hi avizini :) 

Re: device...the short answer is:

Can I use the same username on multiple machine? Yes, you have to copy the data/users.json file to your new machine, from https://zeronet.readthedocs.io/en/latest/faq/#how-to-use-zeronet-with-tor

Re: reserving a username: See the section entitled, "How can I register a .bit domain?" again, here:

https://zeronet.readthedocs.io/en/latest/faq/#how-to-use-zeronet-with-tor

I'm only just learning myself, as a noivchok on the 0net :)

It's possible others here might reply to your questions in due course. I've also found the Reddit 0net forum to be helpful,

https://www.reddit.com/r/zeronet/

Hope this helps?
